My mission is building bridges between economic science and policy making in health insurance & health care. I am straightforward and connect stakeholders based on content and shared interests. My passion is finding useful answers with observational data, computer code and human intelligence. I co-founded two Dutch consulting firms in health care and insurance, Equalis Strategy & Modeling and SiRM - Strategies in Regulated Markets.
